content:
The Flying Skull unit blew up a Chinese golf cart and the Russians with a drone in the Avdiivka direction.

One occupier was killed, the other was a wounded, the Chinese machine was destroyed. In the same direction, snipers of the 3rd SCO regiment were professionally worked. At night, they noticed the movement of the enemy, all who moved were killed.

Drone crews of the 72nd Brigade of the Black Zaporozhians destroyed the Russian shelter with several drones along with the occupiers inside.

Pilots of the 47th Brigade boasted of a video in which the drone flies into the ruins of a building where two occupiers were hiding. One of them managed to survive, after which he abandons his comrade and escapes.

Two more "professional" Russians were engaged in mating of the Dnieper, but their skills were just enough to explode on their own mines.

The Security Service of Ukraine detained a russian agent who wanted to adjust a missile attack on a thermal power plant and a military hospital in Dnipro.
title: Russian storms and dies on golf carria
description: One occupier was killed, another was wounded, and a Chinese machine was destroyed. In the same direction...
author: Army Inform
